content: The path splits here, and you'll probably notice the green Wisp on the right first. On the left, you'll be able to see an enemy with a blue Spirit. You'll want to head for the green Wisp first. But before you go collect it, be prepared that there's a lot of the Revenant Charbones in this area and they'll all charge at you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
The path splits here, and you'll probably notice the green Wisp on the right first. On the left, you'll be able to see an enemy with a blue Spirit. You'll want to head for the green Wisp first. But before you go collect it, be prepared that there's a lot of the Revenant Charbones in this area and they'll all charge at you.
